## Installation

You can install the development version of motivateR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ahuffmyer/motivateR")
```

## Example

This is a basic example:

```{r example}
library(motivateR)
## basic example code
```


## To build and install and test package  

1. devtools::check()
2. devtools::build()
3. devtools::install("../motivateR")
4. library(motivateR)
